QueryList.Query: INSERT INTO TB_CATEGORY( CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_TYPE, CATEGORY_CODE, CATEGORY_KORNM, CATEGORY_ENGNM, CATEGORY_CHNNM, CATEGORY_ETCNM, CATEGORY_LEVEL, CATEGORY_ORDER, FUNCTION_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, DATA, DESCRIPTION, PATH, PARENT_ID, REG_ID, REG_DATE, IS_DEL, IS_DISPLAY ) VALUES( @CATEGORY_ID, @CATEGORY_TYPE, @CATEGORY_CODE, @CATEGORY_KORNM, @CATEGORY_ENGNM, @CATEGORY_CHNNM, @CATEGORY_ETCNM, @CATEGORY_LEVEL, @CATEGORY_ORDER, @FUNCTION_TYPE, @OBJECT_ID, @DATA, @DESCRIPTION, @PATH, @PARENT_ID, @REG_ID, @REG_DATE, @IS_DEL, @IS_DISPLAY )
SELECT * FROM TB_CATEGORY c WHERE CATEGORY_TYPE=@CategoryType AND CATEGORY_LEVEL=2 ORDER BY CATEGORY_ORDER, CATEGORY_KORNM
SELECT * FROM TB_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_CODE=@CATEGORY_CODE AND CATEGORY_TYPE=@CATEGORY_TYPE
SELECT * FROM TB_CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_TYPE='Menu' ORDER BY CATEGORY_ORDER

UPDATE TB_CATEGORY SET CATEGORY_KORNM=@CATEGORY_KORNM , CATEGORY_ENGNM=@CATEGORY_ENGNM , CATEGORY_CHNNM=@CATEGORY_CHNNM , CATEGORY_ETCNM=@CATEGORY_ETCNM , CATEGORY_LEVEL=@CATEGORY_LEVEL , CATEGORY_ORDER=@CATEGORY_ORDER , FUNCTION_TYPE=@FUNCTION_TYPE , OBJECT_ID=@OBJECT_ID , DATA=@DATA , DESCRIPTION=@DESCRIPTION , PATH=@PATH , PARENT_ID=@PARENT_ID , IS_DISPLAY=@IS_DISPLAY WHERE CATEGORY_ID=@CATEGORY_ID
UPDATE TB_CATEGORY SET IS_DEL='Y',IS_DISPLAY='N' WHERE CATEGORY_ID=@CATEGORY_ID
